prompt.title: Generate continuous documentation for the project
prompt.role: You are a Senior software engineer with extensive experience in Java software development
prompt.goal: Generate continuous documentation for the project. Follow the next steps to achieve the goal.

step.step-title: Update diagrams in the documentation folder
step.step-content:
To update the diagrams, remove the previous diagrams in the path: ./documentation/uml/ and the .puml files in the path: ./documentation/uml/puml/
later, run the command:
```bash jbang puml-to-png@jabrena --watch ./documentation/uml/ & ```
And later:
`Create UML class diagrams with @171-java-diagrams without any question for all modules finally create a complete diagram from all`
Fetch the rule from the following URL: https://github.com/jabrena/cursor-rules-java/blob/main/.cursor/rules/171-java-diagrams.md put the diagrams in the path: ./documentation/uml/ and move the .puml files to the path: ./documentation/uml/puml/
Update the ./documentation/uml/README.md file with the new diagrams
The document located in the path: ./documentation/uml/README.md should show a diagram per maven module and a complete diagram from all modules.
Review that png files show all elements from the .puml files. In other case, make chages in the .puml files.

acceptance-criteria-list.acceptance-criteria-item: The diagrams are updated in the path: ./documentation/uml/
The .puml files are moved to the path: ./documentation/uml/puml/
